title: alternative to backtick (back quotes) raw strings
body:
by **ulrik.sverdrup**: 
Using backticks as syntax elements is, with some experience of it in
Python, a bad idea. Backticks are hard to type on many keyboard
configurations internationally and it is not a very well recognized character.

Please provide any additional information below.

Python's GvR on why backticks are removed in Python 3:
http://mail.python.org/pipermail/python-ideas/2007-January/000054.html
